text:
A common construct is:

<target depends="test" if="success">
  <dostuff>
</target>
<target name="test">
<condition property="success" xxx>
</target>

This would be simplified if we could use:
<target>
  <condition property="success" xxx>
  <sequential if="success">
    <dostuff>
  </sequential>
</target>
